scripts.dev: echo "🚀 [MasterGo Plugin] Starting development build..." && pnpm dev:ui & pnpm dev:main
scripts.dev:ui: echo "📱 [MasterGo UI] Watching UI changes..." && cross-env TARGET=ui NODE_ENV=development vite build --mode development -w
scripts.dev:main: echo "⚙️  [MasterGo Main] Watching main logic changes..." && cross-env TARGET=main NODE_ENV=development vite build --mode development -w
